title: Having problem in the game
body: I started today and i m having problems with the game i can't move i can't attck people he just moves and stay where he is and but he level up i have no idea wht is goin on please tell me what to do i want to play this game

replies.body: It sounds like you are experiencing input delay, which may be due to a poor network issue.  I recommend going over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Hope that helps!
